text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, monandi on kofiron maʙoşed, ki dar ʙorai ʙarodaroni xud, ki ʙa safar jo ʙa çang rafta ʙudand, meguftand: «Agar nazdi po monda ʙudand, namemurdand, jo kuşta nameşudand». Xudo in gumonro cun hasrate dar dili onho nihod. Va Xudost, ki zinda mekunad va memironad va Ūst, ki korhoi şumoro meʙinad
